title: Vital Records Mortality and Morbidity Reporting FHIR IG
introduction: The scope of this project is to produce and ballot a Standard for Trail Use (STU) Fast Healthcare Interoperability Resources (FHIR) implementation guide (IG) for use in reporting of death events to the U.S. National Center for Health Statistics (NCHS) by State and Local Public Health Agencies (PHA).The VRDR FHIR IG will be based upon FHIR STU 3

list.desc: Continuous Integration Build (latest in version control)
